name: V_EHI_BDC_FILTER
description: Contains information associated with a denial/correspondence record used for EHI export filtering.

columns.name: BDC_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the denial/correspondence record.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The ID of the corresponding patient.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The contact serial number associated with the professional billing denial or the hospital account.

columns.name: RQG_ID
columns.description: The ID of the corresponding requisition grouper.
